resources.string: Evaluate the lighting condition of your workplace by answering a few questions.
A quick tool to check whether your working area is too bright or too dark.
A quick tool to check whether there is flicker hazard.
A quick tool to check whether there is glare hazard.

Light level is an important factor in the workplace. To measure the illuminance using this function:

 1. Push 			 to start recording 
 2. Face the light sensor up 
 3. Moving the phone horizontally and slowly around the working area 
 4. Push 			 to pause recording 

 In addition:
 		 : Reset the light meter 
 		 : Save the measurement data

Unsteady light may do harm to human and become safety hazards. To detect the possible flicker using this function: 

 1. Face the light sensor direct to the light source 
 2. Push 			 to start detecting 
 3. The Fluctuation Rate of the light source and whether it is a possible visible flicker will be displayed after 10 seconds 

 In addition:
 		 : Reset the detector 
 		 : Save the measurement data
